name: Monochrome (Mkzart, alpargatagazer, Tatosaurio, Jose Manuel Gutierrez, JohnCost)
name_original: Monochrome (Mkzart, alpargatagazer, Tatosaurio, Jose Manuel Gutierrez, JohnCost)
description: Monochrome is a small puzzle videogame in which you will explore a strange world by playing the role of a curious little character. Discover the hidden secrets and unlock the necessary skills to reach the truth...
